ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds

cookingTips: Arrange bacon pieces on crackers before topping with brown sugar for even caramelization

enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how the brown sugar caramelizes with the bacon fat to create a sweet-salty flavor profile.
